resources.string: Set the scale values of the jobs.
There are no jobs. You can add a job by clicking on the + button below.

What is the relative value of the feature in the eyes of the business or the user? (1 being the lowest value and 10 being the highest)?

Answers the following questions:
• Do our users prefer this over that?
• What is the revenue impact on our business?
• Is there a potential penalty or other negative impact if we delay?

This value describes the need of delivering something in a timescale. (1 being a low "need" and 10 being highest "need")

Answers the following questions:
• How does the user/business value decay over time?
• Is there a fixed deadline?
• Will they wait for us or move to another solution?
• What is current effect on customer satisfaction?

Gives a relative value for the need of a business to eliminate risks earlier or the potential for new business opportunity to be derived from the task. (1 being a low "need" and 13 being highest "need")

Answers the following questions:
• What else does this do for our business?
• Does it reduce the risk of this or future delivery?
• Is there value in the information we will receive?
• Will this feature enable new business opportunities?
The estimate of length of time to implement the feature. (1 being the shortest duration and 10 being the highest)
